casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

01-20. Mid-America Tire, Inc. v. PTZ Trading Ltd.

Clermont App. No. CA99-11-105. On motion for admission pro hac vice of Bart Rinn by Paul S. Turner and on motion for admission pro hac vice of Carl D. Liggio by Paul S. Turner. Motions granted.

F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.

Discretionary appeal allowed.

F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.

Discretionary cross-appeal allowed.

F.E. Sweeney and Cook, JJ., dissent.
